certificate.title: Certificate of Appreciation
certificate.event: Embedded Systems Using Raspberry Pi Hackathon by Naan Mudhalvan
certificate.project: Automated attendence system using raspberry pi
certificate.description: Awarded for achieving 1st place in the Embedded Systems Using Raspberry Pi Hackathon conducted under the Naan Mudhalvan program organized by TANSAM. Recognized for excellent participation and outstanding work.
